banner.heading: Your mental health is important – Sensa gives you the tools to help you improve it
banner.category-heading: What are you struggling with the most right now?

sensaInfo.title: Why Sensa?
sensaInfo.intro: Sensa is designed to cater to a wide range of users, suffering from many forms of mental health issues. Here's some of the ways it can help you.
sensaInfo.content1: Constantly-evolving content reviewed by professional behavioral therapists.
sensaInfo.content2: Guides you through your journey with advice tailored to your exact needs.
sensaInfo.content3: Provides you with the tools you need to work on yourself.

section1.title: Why does it matter?
section1.text1: Did you know that 76% of Americans encountered stress or anxiety issues in the past year alone?
section1.text2: Unfortunately, the seriousness of conditions like stress, anxiety, and depression is often understated – these issues can manifest into physical symptoms if not treated properly.
section1.text3: Sensa is built to help you through whatever mental health issues affect you most. From burnout to procrastination, ADHD to anxiety, and everything in between.

section2.title: What is Sensa?
section2.text1: Sensa is a mobile application designed to work as your complete guide to improved mental health. Built upon the principles of Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT), Sensa utilizes developed techniques to fight against a plethora of mental health issues, including anxiety, stress, depression, procrastination, ADHD, Self-esteem and burnout.
section2.text2: This list is constantly growing, however; and Sensa is always looking for new ways to help users no matter what they suffer from.

clientReviews.title: Don’t just take our word for it
clientReviews.subtitle: Hear how Sensa has improved the lives of these users:

reviewsData.content1: Sensa has completely changed my life. I was struggling a lot with procrastination and generalized anxiety, but the daily guidance and lessons have allowed me to really focus on myself and feel much better as a result.
reviewsData.content2: I was so used to being completely exhausted. Working 12-hour shifts and feeling tired and drained was just part of my routine, but I didn’t realize how much of these symptoms were signs of burnout until I tried Sensa. My routine hasn’t changed, but the way I view it has, and the mind is a powerful thing!
reviewsData.content3: I always viewed my ADHD as just a part of my life, until it started causing me serious issues in my work performance. Through Sensa, I learned to plan and manage my daily tasks effectively, and without feeling overwhelmed.

footer.heading: sensa.health
footer.disclaimer: Disclaimer: Results may vary due to individual differences. In addition, mental self-help apps like Sensa are not a replacement for or a form of therapy, nor are they intended to cure, treat, or diagnose medical conditions, including psychiatric conditions. Please consult a qualified health care provider for a medical treatment plan.
